name: Shoobs
headline: We help you find and book tickets to great entertainment events thatâ¦
description:
Shoobs offers event organisers with a convenient and powerful platform to sell tickets to their events. A couple of years ago we got thinking that selling tickets should be QUICK & EASY!
So, we decided to create Shoobs to help event organisers sell out their events efficiently!
Shoobs is the leading destination to discover and book great urban culture events in the UK,
such as Hip Hop concerts and RnB club nights.

generated_description:
**Shoobs** is a company founded in 2013 that serves as a go-to platform for discovering and booking tickets to entertainment events in the UK, particularly those centered around urban culture — think Hip Hop concerts, RnB club nights, and festivals. Born out of the realization that ticket sales should be “Quick and Easy” for event organizers, Shoobs has effectively streamlined the ticketing process to ensure that events sell out efficiently.

Located in London and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W14, Shoobs is a small yet dynamic team of five. Their mission is clear: they aim to help you find and secure tickets for amazing entertainment experiences effortlessly. Whether you're hunting for the latest Hip Hop concert or an eclectic mix at a local festival, Shoobs has you covered.

As a marketplace for urban culture events, Shoobs stands out in its niche, making it simple for users to explore categories like clubbing, comedy, live music, and more. They are not just about selling tickets; they also embrace community and culture, connecting people through exciting experiences. 

So, if you're in the market for vibrant nightlife or live performances, head to [Shoobs.com](http://shoobs.com) to check out what’s happening near you — this platform makes it easier to enjoy the culture and music you love.
